name: Power Shovel
description:
Power Shovel is an arcade/simulation where you get to drive excavators of various sizes to do more or less realistic tasks. These include; digging holes, loading sand on trucks, tearing down old buildings, destroying abandoned cars and serving soup in a restaurant (using the scoop as a soup ladle), and many more.

There are a few different modes in the game you can choose from, like "License king" where you earn your driver's license. "Arcade king" is where you do will spend most of the time, since it's where most of the games are. As you progress through the many timed games you earn money, which you use to unlock special features like extra credits, photo galleries and sound effects.

shot.caption: Here's a list of what you have to do to earn your license.
When you play Arcade King you can pick from either Beginner Mode or Part Timer Mode, and eventually (when you unlocked it) yet another mode.
One of the mini games in Part Timer Mode: "Destroy that public nuisance car".
After every job/mini game you get your pay slip. Use the money to unlock extras in the game.
You better be hungry when you come to this restaurant. Each serving is 200 liters of curry!
Dig a deep hole before the time runs out!
In the level editor you can build your own obstacle courses. This one has an exploding barrel and a toilet.
These are the difficulty levels in Beginner Mode. They all have their own set of stages to get through.
The first stage is a tutorial in how to use the scoop properly.
